Fornication.definition: consensual sexual intercourse between a man and esp. single woman who are not married to each other ;also
Fornication.origin: [Late Latin fornicatio , from fornicare to have intercourse with prostitutes, from Latin fornic - fornix arch, vault, brothel]

1.1: consensual sexual intercourse between a man and esp. single woman who are not married to each other

2.1: the crime of engaging in fornication compare
2.note: Where still considered a crime, fornication is classified as a misdemeanor.
